meanings.definition: A group or set of four people or things.
meanings.sent1: In our family, we always play board games in quaternities.
meanings.sent2: The quaternities of students worked together on the science project.
meanings.sent3: The quaternities of ducks waddled in perfect formation.
meanings.sent4: The quaternities of trees stood tall and proud in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The quaternities of colors in the painting created a harmonious blend.

meanings.sent1: She bought a pack of quaternities of cupcakes for the party.
meanings.sent2: The clock struck four quaternities, signaling the end of the school day.
meanings.sent3: The quaternities of seasons bring changes throughout the year.
meanings.sent4: The quaternities of wheels on the bicycle spun quickly down the hill.
meanings.sent5: The quaternities of corners in the room were all neatly decorated.

meanings.definition: A set of four lines of verse.
meanings.sent1: The poet wrote a beautiful poem with quaternities as the structure.
meanings.sent2: The quaternities of lines in the stanza rhymed perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The quaternities of words danced on the page with rhythm and rhyme.
meanings.sent4: Her favorite poem was written in quaternities, each line flowing gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The quaternities of verses in the song captured the listeners' hearts.
